c74object.name: soundworks.shared-state
c74object.digest: Monitor and control soundworks' shared states.
c74object.description: Utility to monitor and control IRCAM-ISMM soundworks' shared states within Max using WebSocket communications Communicate with dictionaries or [key value] pair to this object.

objarg.name: schemaName
objarg.digest: Name of the schema to be attached to.

method.name: bang
method.description: Retrieve state current values as dictionnary

method.name: schema
method.digest: Ask for the schema of soundworks' states
method.description: Ask for the formal definition of the parameters of soundworks' state.

method.name: dictionary
method.digest: Update state according to given dictionnary
method.description: Update state according to given dictionnary

method.name: message
method.digest: Update state according to given [key value] pairs
method.description: Update state according to given [key value] pairs

attribute.name: ip
attribute.description: IP Address of soundworks' server. Default is 127.0.0.1

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: Port of soundworks' server. Default is 8000
